mapper.sql: FAVORITE_ID, CASE_ID, CREATION_TIME, FAVORITE_UID, COMP_ID, CASE_NO, CASE_TYPE, FAVORITE_STATUS
mapper.insert: insert into FUN_CASE_FAVORITE (CASE_ID, CREATION_TIME, FAVORITE_UID, COMP_ID, CASE_NO, CASE_TYPE, FAVORITE_STATUS) values (#{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{favoriteUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{favoriteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.update:
update FUN_CASE_FAVORITE
CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FAVORITE_UID = #{favoriteUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
FAVORITE_STATUS = #{favoriteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where FAVORITE_ID = #{favoriteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update FUN_CASE_FAVORITE set CASE_ID = #{caseId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FAVORITE_UID = #{favoriteUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COMP_ID = #{compId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASE_NO = #{caseNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASE_TYPE = #{caseType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, FAVORITE_STATUS = #{favoriteStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT} where FAVORITE_ID = #{favoriteId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS ATTR_NAME FROM FUN_CASE_FAVORITE WHERE FAVORITE_UID = #{param.favoriteUid} AND COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND CASE_TYPE = #{param.caseType} AND FAVORITE_STATUS = 1
select FAVORITE_UID from FUN_CASE_FAVORITE where COMP_ID = #{compId} AND CASE_ID = #{caseId} and CASE_TYPE = #{caseType}

select
from FUN_CASE_FAVORITE where CASE_ID = #{caseId} and CASE_TYPE = #{caseType} AND FAVORITE_UID = #{userId} AND FAVORITE_STATUS = 1

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM FUN_CASE_FAVORITE A JOIN fun_sale B on A.case_id=B.sale_id WHERE A.FAVORITE_UID = #{param.favoriteUid} AND A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.CASE_TYPE = #{param.caseType} AND A.FAVORITE_STATUS = 1 and B.sale_status != 7

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM FUN_CASE_FAVORITE A JOIN fun_lease B on A.case_id=B.lease_id WHERE A.FAVORITE_UID = #{param.favoriteUid} AND A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.CASE_TYPE = #{param.caseType} AND A.FAVORITE_STATUS = 1 and B.lease_status != 7

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM FUN_CASE_FAVORITE A JOIN FUN_BUY_CUSTOMER B on A.case_id=B.BUY_CUST_ID WHERE A.FAVORITE_UID = #{param.favoriteUid} AND A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.CASE_TYPE = #{param.caseType} AND A.FAVORITE_STATUS = 1 and B.BUY_CUST_STATUS != 7

SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM FUN_CASE_FAVORITE A JOIN FUN_RENT_CUSTOMER B on A.case_id=B.RENT_CUST_ID WHERE A.FAVORITE_UID = #{param.favoriteUid} AND A.COMP_ID = #{param.compId} AND A.CASE_TYPE = #{param.caseType} AND A.FAVORITE_STATUS = 1 and B.RENT_CUST_STATUS != 7
SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM FUN_CASE_FAVORITE WHERE COMP_ID = #{compId} AND FAVORITE_UID = #{currentUserId} AND CASE_TYPE = #{caseType} AND FAVORITE_STATUS = 1
